description:
Your bestseller about the Order of evil witches has grabbed the attention of a huge publisher. 
They're ready to cut you a check, but they want to get the draft of your next horror novel as soon as possible. 
You decide to write about Bloody Mary. What a luck! Pennsylvania Museum has presented a unique exhibit â€“ the mirror of Mary herself. 
You go there to do research, but the legend turns out to be more than fiction. 
Try to survive the encounter with a vengeful ghost by solving puzzles and looking for objects hidden in both human and ghostly worlds!

- Investigate the disappearance of a young woman and meet mysterious La Llorona in the Bonus Chapter!
- Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games!
- Find more collectibles and morphing objects!
name: City Legends: Trapped In Mirror Collector's Edition
intro:
On your way to writing the perfect supernatural novel, be prepared to face danger. 
Are you ready for such desperate measures?
